item.title: 我如何作为16YO开发人员获得付费实习？
item.description:
[讨论] hi，我16岁，我想要一个实习，但似乎找不到 /获得一个。.我主要是在C / ++中编程，并且我非常精通它。 I have 2 successful projects hosted on GitHub (700+ stars, 50+stars) which have a large community behind them too but no matter what I have to display, I can't get a job offer due to not having even a High School level qualification other than my GCSE results which are still yet to come.I have also tried to email people from companies by scraping their email address' but to no avail as I haven't gotten a single response back, which is to be expected I guess.On places like R/实习，我还看到人们抱怨无薪实习如何与现代奴隶制相提并论，这使我不想要一个。无论如何，我也有一家真正的工作经验，无论是从连接而获得的，这确实让我很高兴从工作中获得报酬。如果您有任何提示，我会觉得自己觉得自己处于死胡同时，我会很感激。如果您对我的存储库感兴趣：github.com/uint23
注释url： https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=44717966 点：1 ＃评论：2
